ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Sticker shock!
ygData.msgSnippet: I suspect, when they were junk loot, people were getting more than they could use. Now, people are not camping for rubicite, so there are not so many people
ygData.messageBody:
I suspect, when they were junk loot, people were getting more
than they could use.

Now, people are not camping for rubicite, so there are not
so many people there getting a claok they already have too many
copies of. Supply and Demand.

On Wed, 5 Jul 2000, Elijah Meeker wrote:

>I was all excited about my newbie bard buying a Lizard scale cloak (7AC, +5
>dex)for about 80pp which Tszaaz had done long ago. I see they are now around
>300pp. They USED to be the junk loot for Rubicite campers, are they now the
>rare drop? *heavy sigh*
>That is depressing...
>
>Tszaaz
